title: Assur Archive 34
description: 4 clay tablets were found in dA6IV in a private house. These tablets were found near House 12 (Assur Archive 33) and House 9 (Assur Archive 32). The archive dates to the 7th century BC. The group consists of 2 loan documents concerning silver, a list of oxen and textiles, and a purchase document concerning a slave.

properties.description: Representative locations of the Neo-Assyrian archive at Assur on the basis of Peders√©n 1987 Plan(s) 62.
properties.title: Plan location of Assur Archive 34
